39460151.review:
Не назову себя любителем жанра Tower Defense, даже не поклонник - мимокупил по совету друга. Сказали бы, что мне дико понравится игра, на 99% состоящая из Майкла Бэя - не поверил бы, но вдруг тут оказалась вещь, и вещь сделанная с любовью. Взрывы, мельтешения, вспышки, падающие здания, горящие деревья, бомбящий генерал - от этого не устаёшь и не напрягаешься совершенно. Всё просто и удобно, при этом зрелищно - хорошая графика для такой игры, разрушаемость окружения c кучей эффектов вроде физики, боевая музычка и, хм, сюжет :D Сейчас ещё выживание завезут и будет вообще хорошо. Самые разные враги и эпичные (нет, ЭПИЧНЫЕ ОБР С ЛАЗЕРАМИ И РАКЕТАМИ БОЖЕ) боссы в комплекте.

Уровень сложности ставьте повыше, так интереснее ;)

39455686.review:
[h1]Хм… Когда же я, в последний раз, заигрывался и получал настоящее удовольствие в [b]Tower Defense[/b]? Довольно давно и, далеко, не в самом обычном, ведь это [b]Plants vs. Zombies[/b]! Я не дока в подобном, весьма нишевом жанре, ибо типичный процесс, как бы качественно он ни был обставлен, лично мне, весьма быстро приедается. Поэтому, если я и клюю на подобный жанр, то из-за чего-то действительно необычного и [b]X-Morph: Defense[/b], действительно есть, что предложить.[/h1]

[h1]Что это?[/h1]
Хоть я и обмолвился, что перед нами [b]Tower Defense[/b], на самом деле, это еще и [b]Scroll’up Shooter[/b], причем, с элементами [b]стратегии[/b]. Играть предстоит, что примечательно, за инопланетного захватчика, а значит, ярость всех сверхдержав и многонациональных сверхсекретных подразделений [i](подобных [b]X-Com[/b])[/i], обратится против игрока.

[h1]Tower Defense + Strategy[/h1]
Казалось бы, вот они, различные башенки с отличным друг от друга боевым арсеналом. Знай себе, расставляй на злобу вражеским юнитам, да успевай реагировать на изменения. На деле все обстоит иначе. Начнем с того, что все бои происходят на достаточно плотно заполненном поле брани. Многоэтажные высотки, промышленные комплексы и прочие строения, будут выполнять свою роль, а не играть функцию декора. Например, любую башню можно водрузить прямиком на здание, получив при этом определенные преимущества, собственно, как и некоторые недостатки.

Более того, как только в инопланетном арсенале станет доступно, наверняка, многими излюбленное оружие, совершающее, после накопления энергии, мощнейший залп, появится возможность, за считаные секунды обрушать целые здания, которые порой настолько высоки, что могут задеть само НЛО с фатальными последствиями. И это создано не только для того, чтобы усладить игрока, вот таким вот беспроигрышным козырем, из-за которого чувствуешь себя ребенком в песочнице, а все для того же, стратегического маневра. Ведь, если правильно подбить высоченный маяк, то можно перекрыть путь войскам, из-за чего им придется прокладывать более длинный маршрут, или вот, стратегически важный мост, обрушенный в нужное время, не только развернул войска, но и унес в водную пучину особо “пухлую” технику. Главное, во всей этой взрывной феерии нужно уметь вовремя остановиться и подумать, ведь обрушая все подряд, можно наоборот, помочь наступающим силам врага.
Однако, это не единственная возможность перекрыть путь жалким людишкам, т.к. между башнями можно протягивать энергетические заграждения, которые играют ключевую роль на протяжении всей игры и которые, могут увеличить маршрут врага более чем в два раза.
[quote][h1][u]Важный факт[/u]:[/h1]
Кого колотит лишь от одной мысли, что каждую башенку требуется всячески оберегать – могут выдохнуть. Ну, почти. Большинство юнитов не может сделать башням ничего вообще. Краски сгущаются позже, когда появляются специализированные юниты, коих не так много. Одни играют больше как отвлекающий фактор, на который просто нужно правильно и вовремя среагировать. Другие заставляют перенести башни в иное место, т.к. планируется бомбардировка. Ну и никто не отменял Боссов – было бы странно, если бы огромные махины не могли уничтожить башню на своем пути.[/quote]

[h1]Scroll’up Shooter[/h1]
Отрадно, что шутерная часть удалась разработчикам ничуть не хуже. Вот вы обезопасили все подступы  и ждете прихода войск. И тут начинаются настоящие “потные ладошки”, где требуется вовремя уходить в состояние невидимости, оперативно уничтожать различные виды войск [i](причем некоторые нацелены на уничтожение именно НЛО)[/i], умело варьировать доступное вооружение, быстро собирать энергию и отстраивать дополнительные башни. Дел невпроворот. Чем вы дальше проходите, тем больше типов войск штурмует базу и тем больше подступов к вашему инопланетному “Оку Саурона”. Даже легчайшая сложность, рано или поздно заставит игрока напрячься, не говоря уже о высших. 
[quote][h1] ↑Level UP↑ [/h1]
Между миссиями есть возможность поразмыслить, во что бы вложить драгоценные очки. А думать есть над чем, ведь здесь присутствует масса полезностей, причем не самых типичных. Например, можно увеличить дальность протяжения ограждений, что в умных руках превращается в поразительное тактическое преимущество.[/quote]

Рано или поздно, на сцену выступаю Боссы, отличные друг от друга и представляющие какую-либо страну. И это действительно Боссы, будто созданные для умерщвления Кайдзю и сошедшие с простор натурального [b]Scroll’up[/b] или [b]Shoot’em Up[/b], на слабые точки которых нужно оперативно воздействовать всем доступным арсеналом, иначе ядру наступит неминуемый конец. При этом, еще требуется сохранить и собственную шкуру, ведь некоторые представители устраивают натуральный [b]Bullet Hell[/b]. К тому же, особо живучие, даже не чураются наступать в нескольких волнах, дабы, наконец, достичь поставленной цели, или феерично взорваться, украсив местные, совсем еще свежие развалины, огромным пылающим остовом и внушая мелким “таракашкам” неподдельный страх за свою жизнь.

[h1]”Destroy, destroy all”[/h1]
Напоследок, хочется еще сказать несколько слов о физике и разрушаемости. Конечно, хотелось бы видеть сей аспект куда более продвинутым [i](лучшую модульную разрушаемость вкупе с физикой, цепные реакции)[/i], но и того, что имеется, на самом деле достаточно, ведь подобное нам предлагают крайне редко. 

Разрушается на здешних просторах абсолютно все: от техники до построек. Огромные дома падают, мелкие разносятся в щепки, более приземистые разрушаются модульно и являют хоть и скромную, но утварь. Деревья не только выкорчевываются взрывом, но и прогибаются от взрывной волны, а некоторые, не выдерживая ломаются как спички. Ну и, конечно, наступает тотальный апокалипсис, когда на подиум выходит дефилировать местный босс, ведь в задачу оного входит уничтожение врага любыми способами, а значит, сохранность города и безопасность горожан не играют роли.

[h1] Отмечу отдельным минусом, все же, типичное для жанра, наступающее со временем, однообразие и выветривание, где уже просто ждешь, очередной схватки с новым боссом. Не хватает дополнительного геймплейного пласта, возможно, переворачивающего все с ног, на голову, как и увеселений [i](режимы, второстепенные миссии и пр.)[/i] и чуть большего заигрывания с физикой и концепцией. Также, меня всю игру преследовало чувство, что разработчикам стоило чуть больше потрудиться над стилем и упаковать все действо в сеттинг 40-50-х годов.   
Резюмируя все вышесказанное, скажу, что перед нашими глазами, конечно, не бомба, как и не игра на все времена, но достаточно сильный проект, который, наверняка будет интересен ценителям обозначенных жанров. Особенно, если этих ценителей два, ведь для них припасен кооператив.

Saw this pop on imgur, and decided to follow it, now that it was on sale with it's a definitive and amazing addition to my library.

39390561.review:
Tower Defense com Shoot´em UP. O jogo é fantástico, não tem aquele "mais do mesmo" que vemos sempre nos Towers Defense, nesse aqui você não coloca as torres antes das waves e depois só fica olhando... não... não... Aqui você coloca as torres e vai pra cima deles com sua nave, dando muito tiro.

Existem elementos básicos de qualquer tower defense, como a avolução das torres e da nave que você controla, atualização das armas, etc...

Outra coisa que achei muito legal, é que na história, você assume o papel do alienígena invasor da Terra. Você vai ter que enfrentar os exércitos humanos com sua tecnologia álien.

Para fechar, o jogo tem legandas em português BR, gráficos, efeitos visuais, trilha sonora, etc.... muito bem feitos.

Até agora não achei nada de negativo nesse jogo e recomendo. Agora vou parar de escrever e jogar, fiquem ai com um GAME PLAY que acabei de fazer da primeira fase.

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1271080677

39364175.review:
Really fun game that can be quite hectic and hard but the strategy part of the Tower Defense mixes well with the action part of the Shoot-Them-Up.

Doing the full campaign in coop (local split-screen) you should expect about 17-25h of gameplay depending on your skill and difficulty level.

The game run 100% smoothly even with hundreds of enemies and building collapsing in giant explosions!

Honestly, can't wait for more content (community workshop maps) and the new game modes and content announced by the Devs.

If you like tower defenses, you can play alone or with a friend, go on without hesitattion! :)

39361797.review:
全成就且拿到数个世界前百排名之后写下这篇评论，希望对大家有帮助。


[h1] [b] 一、概述 [/b] [/h1] 

[b]A. [/b]这是一款融合了射击元素的TD游戏，玩家不仅可以升级防御塔，还能 升级战机和基地。

[b]B. [/b]画面非常不错，而且可以通过改变地貌来改变进攻方的行进路线（比如摧毁建筑物和桥梁）

[b]C. [/b]玩家扮演外星人防守方，对抗地球军队的进攻方。

[b]D. [/b]战机可以改变模式和形态：幽灵模式无法攻击，但是可以建造塔，收集碎片（需要升级）；攻击形态有4种：
[olist]
[*]默认（对空对地，攻击力低，蓄力攻击在前期可以消灭一条直线上的敌人）。
[*]导弹（对空，攻击力高，蓄力技能范围伤害，且可以干扰导弹）。
[*]激光（空地，对抗重型目标，初始攻击不高，随着攻击单一目标的时间增加伤害提高，蓄力攻击为风暴黑洞，减速，且中心区域可以直接摧毁非大型目标）。
[*]轰炸（对地，蓄力攻击炸弹范围伤害，且可以摧毁建筑和桥梁） 
[/olist]

前期 [b] [1] [/b]很好用，后期的普攻多在 [b] [2] [/b]、 [b] [4] [/b]之间切换（ [b] [1] [/b]、[u] [3] [/u]主要是技能为主，不太用普攻， [b] [3] [/b]需要持续对单一目标锁定，但是很容易受到干扰，不论是躲避攻击还是目标单位边上冒出来其他单位，都会影响 [b] [3] [/b]的攻击效果）


[h1] [b] 二、键盘手柄 & 升级 [/b] [/h1]

[b]1. [/b]键盘和手柄我都试过，明显是键盘更灵活准确 

[b]2. [/b]建议将转换模式的按键从Shift换成更顺手的按键，我是换成Space 

[b]3. [/b]建议优先升级：攻击形态

[b]4. [/b]（原因上面已经说过啦），收集碎片，战机辅助攻击，战机辅助拦截，战机恢复，在某些地图上建议升级电网长度，如尼日利亚、中国。


[h1] [b] 三、金牌 & 成就 & 一些技巧 [/b] [/h1]
[list]
[*]普通难度得分系数=1，简单=0.5，困难=1.5，所以困难难度容易得高分拿金牌。

[*]加拿大（成就）：1200米防线成就：倒数第二波，让右侧中上出兵点的路线绕到基地左侧，之后我上传一张截图。

[*]尼日利亚：第一波防御塔集中造在兵线汇合点，否则输出不够。之后在基地周围造环形防线。BOSS出来后先打断1条腿（也有打断2条腿的，看操作了），然后技能[b] [2] [/b]蓄力+ [b] [4] [/b]蓄力+ [b] [4] [/b]普攻，打身体，身体两侧武器打爆之后武器[b] [3] [/b]打躯干。

[*]美国（成就）：运输车队出现在地图左侧。

[*]夏威夷（成就）：敌军基地只要打掉那个建筑就行，炮塔可以不管，否则时间来不及。另外这图其实只需要对空防御塔，空战打好，地面没压力。

[*]中国：很多人说这张地图是最难打的，但是我在这张地图的排名却是自己最高的（世界16），这里说下我的大致思路。基地向上看到的第一个核电站炸毁，确保封死道路。基地右上道路封死，基地右侧偏上的桥梁炸毁（偏下的那座桥千万不要炸毁，战斗中千万注意）。 防御塔布置：通过防御塔让左侧的兵通过基地左下绕道基地右下（左侧防御延伸，让对方多绕点路），这样大多数情况下只有一个路径通往你的基地。

[*]对付跳跃步兵：导弹防空塔比喷火好用

[*]对付跳跃机甲：对地激光塔比对空激光塔好用

[*]合作模式（成就）：我是单人完成的，由于没有得分要求，选择简单难度，插一个手柄作为二号机，二号机造完塔就不用管，升级完战机辅助攻击之后找个地方放着稍微提供点防御火力。
[/list]

39286982.developer_response:
Hi, I think the problem you are experiencing with the difficulty is actually not using the tower defense aspect of the game to its full potential. Please check out this playthrough video for a for a few minutes and observe how the towers and laser fences can be built to form a maze for the enemies:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EWQ4Mr6HTHs

Mazing is the key aspect of X-Morph: Defense. Without planning your defense before the wave begins you won't stand a chance in later levels.

We have also (just recently) added the "very easy" game mode where you get additional resources for every wave.

Please try those things and I'm quite positive you might enjoy the game a lot more.

39264577.review:
great game. Perfect mix of shmup and tower defence. 

Basically before each wave you can set up tower but also destroy some terain to alter to path (like blowing up the base of a building on one side: it will fall on that side)
Your ship have 2 mode: an "active" and a "ghost" form.

the ghost form make you immute to damage, able to build thoses turret and dynamically add/removed/upgrade during the wave. you can also gather the ressources looted from the enemies killed if you took the upgrade alowing that.

the "active" form allow you to use your ship as if you were playing a shmup. with 3 (or4) type of weapon and  sub "charged" weapon (who depend on the main weapon type).
ex: air to air rocket with EMP as secondary or bomber with "super" bomb as secondary.

the game can be challengin in the lastest difficulty setting as you will have to create the best path possible, mix between active (to help your turrets and kills enemies) and ghost (to gether ressources and change yoru layout/ replace turret desroyed by enemies Bomber).

with great visual and physics (thoses trees and building physics ! ) 
8/10 (could have more variety in upgrades)

39096243.review:
Nothing but praise. The way the game allows constant re-speccing / replacing of towers, upgrades etc. (both ingame as well as in the upgrade tree) with no drawback / cost is refreshing, as well as challenging. The game doesn't just offer you this ability to give you the option, but rather [i]pushes[/i] you to constantly adapt to the mission and situation at hand.

Out of the game, you're deciding between upgrades (both passive upgrades to your ship / core [your enemy's goal] as well as "technology" upgrades that upgrade your towers, changing them into different types of towers, or weapons for your ship and upgrades to those) that are most suitable for that level. Ingame, you're constantly having to replace towers between waves to adapt to the new enemy paths that open up and / or new enemy spawnpoints that appear. Levels often have entire flanks open up around the core that you need to plan an effective defense for when the level starts opening up more, various cardinal directions around the core having whole new parts of the level appearing as waves progress and the situation gets more and more hectic.

About that last bit - the game gets [i]very[/i] intense at times and chaotic, and it's an absolute blast! You're constantly having to check your minimap to stay abreast of current developments around your towers and enemy movement. Whenever there's some down time (due to towers handling smaller numbers of weaker enemies), you're flying around in "ghost mode", picking up supplies so that you can build more towers (which you do in ghost mode, when you're invincible and can move somewhat faster than outside of it). You're often hecticly building a few extra towers mid-wave, as you're flying around trying to make sure nothing gets to your core, which means having to pay attention to when you need to bring your own ship weapons to bear.

In local coop, this game is [i][b][u]amazingly fun!!![/u][/b][/i] I played this a bunch with a buddy and we both agreed that it's a prime example of a fun coop exprience. Supplies must be picked up by each player individually and accrue per player, which allows construction of more towers - but either player can sell, upgrade or move any towers on the field, meaning you can very quickly share resources; the open-ended "here's tools, go accomplish stuff" mentality carries over to how coop play is handled, as well. Coop play = lots of communication, backing each other up or taking turns watching certain areas, constantly having one fire while the other collects supplies or builds another tower, or connects another laser fence to block or impede enemy movement. A huge part of the game is about identifying enemy routes and using towers to block those off. Towers can be connected to one another by a laser fence, which means you can build all sorts of constructions to delay and slow down the enemy in all manner of different ways. This is usually done inbetween waves (where you have as much time as you want to plan and build - but taking longer [i]does[/i] reduce your final score). However, there's another way to block routes, and it's a very, very cool concept, executed perfectly - destructible environments.

Everything in the level can be, well, levelled. But the interesting bit comes when you start using a Dark Matter charge shot to create a gravity well and destroy tall buildings, yanking them over as they crumble where you shot them. Now, I only mention that weapon because it's the most effective and sure-fire way of having a building fall in the direction you want it to. That's right - buildings have actual physics applied to them as they topple. It makes for some very interesting and rewarding play when you figure out a way to route enemies way, way around the level, or consolidate streams of them into a few bundles you can more easily unload a lot of damage on with either a lot of towers or your ship's weapons, using destructible terrain to do so.

Then there's the bosses. Yeah, there are big as hell bosses with some creative and quite badass looking design on them that lumber through levels, often toppling buildings as they go and unloading quite some damage towards your ship. They'll crush towers they step on, too, necessitating some quick changes in tower layout before tackling them in the final wave of a level.

All in all, this game is a very interesting take on the tower defense genre that's really fun to play and challenging in a fair manner, that necessitates quick reflexes as much as intelligent planning, and one I can heartily recommend to anyone looking for a really, really fun time with a friend :)

38770402.review:
The trophy of "best tower defense game" hasn't had much movement these past few years. Sure there was Defense Grid (2008), Bloons TD5 (2011), and then Kingdom Rush (2011). But since Kingdrom Rush, there has never been a title strong enough to claim the throne. Well, that day has ended, because X-Morph: Defense (2017) is it. And hell, it's about damn time.

Crappy title aside, X-Morph: Defense is an absolute monster of a TD. First and foremost, the hybrid combat of shooter and TD works beautifully. The game rests head and shoulders on this hybrid-like gameplay and lo-and-behold it just works. Neither the towers nor the shooting are an afterthought and the balance is very very good. Every tower has its time to shine and so does every weapon on your ship.

It also sports an excellent length (first run on "Normal" clocks in at around 14 hours). Graphics are beautiful. But it's the excellent gameplay that brings it home. It's challenging and the levels are very well designed. More casual players will definitely want to dial down the difficulty to "Easy" as things can get punishing fast!

An absolute must-play for fans of tower defense games.

It's a mix of a tower defense and a twin stick shoot em' up. You pilot a small alien fighter craft and must defend your core from hostile humans, because you kinda invaded earth and now aim to wipe out all life. The maps are quite open and with many possible paths, so much of the game is you trying to figure out how you should place your fences and towers to fit the map best. 38554043.review:
Much, much better than I thought it was going to be. This haunted my wishlist for a few months and I have been pleasant surprised in my first ~45 minutes or so. Levels are long and sometimes exhausting but I am excited to see a Tower Defense that's much more active than others in its genre. 

We control a ship that can pester enemies and thin out the hordes of human enemies while dealing with aircrafts that shoot at us and only us. Through this ship you can build towers that can link to each other and manipulate the direction enemies go. All of that is common fare for TD games but the fact that we have a controllable ship really brings some much needed nuance to a fairly copy/paste genre. 

The game really sold me on its first boss fight where a giant spider mech stomped on my towers and shot me down once with a laser cannon I wasn't quite prepared for. Shooting out its legs caused it to stop for several merciful seconds and allowed me to unload into its main part. When I brought it down, I felt better than I have in a TD game in a long time.

I love TD games but most these days seem to be stuck in stagnation where you plop some towers down and then fast-foward (a required mechanic to be honest) and see how they perform. Ocassionally upgrading as necessary. Here the upgrades are all more like side-grades to change your strategy as you face new enemies wave per wave so it keeps you on your toes and if you can't just plop down a set number of each towers; You really need to change them on each wave and it really works.

I recommend this one if you like the genre but have felt bored with them in the last few years.

38241350.review:
I really liked Zombie Driver HD, another destruction and explosive-festivity from EXOR, so I had high hopes regarding X-Morph, and boy, they didn't disappoint. This is a pretty cool shoot'em'up - tower defense hybrid, with solid gameplay foundations, a nice upgrade system, good visuals, a healthy dose of challenge (especially on Normal difficulty and above), but most importantly, breathtaking battles and a stunning destruction system. Really, being an invader never felt so good.

The game's also optimized quite well, and runs rock solid on my rig, I only encountered one sole crash to desktop on the penultimate level, but otherwise, the game's really bug-free. My only complaint is about the lack of online co-op mode, but here's hoping EXOR would remedy this in the future.

Also, a minor tip: If you aren't really experienced in tower defense, make sure to start on Easy. The game throws you a good amount of challenge on Normal already, probably because the levels were made with co-op mode in mind too. Switch to Normal once you are confident in tower placement and moving/changing them during battle as well.

Still, excellent work team - I'm looking forward to the sequel hinted in the ending. ;)

设定很意外，反转式设定，你作为拥有先进科技的外星人，布置自己的防线，抵挡人类的进攻并最终占领人类的世界

整体来说难度并不是很大，游戏开始时也可以根据自己的需要调整难度，塔防炮台种类并不多，但是每种防御设施的用处和应对性体现的很充分，比如说防空炮台，只需要简单的几个就可以抵御大量的空中进攻部队，如果就少那么1 2个防空炮台，整个关卡的难易度体验就会变得截然不同。

炮台的摆放和封路也许是这款作品最有特色和策略性的点，两个相临的炮台点可以构成光束墙，这种神奇而又简单的操作会直接改变敌人的行走路径（出兵前敌人的路径都是可见的，通过封路所改变的路径会直接反应在地图上），每一波的出兵是由玩家主动开始的，这和普通塔防滚雪球式的进攻差距很大，缺少了一些紧迫感，但是却又加大了策略性，让你有足够的时间去思考自己的摆阵，通过封路来让敌人更可能的去绕最远的路，这样才能保证己方输出足够，一旦玩家主动开始选择出兵防守，那么游戏的节奏又会突然加快，不失正常塔防的紧迫感。

有趣的是炮台的回收是免费的，加上游戏中一些轰炸机路径的设计，我们也需要频繁调整炮台的布局，可能上一波还很稳的布局，这一波如果不调整的话，炮台甚至会直接变为不可用，当然，已经开始防守的时候，因为比较混乱，再布局是很困难的，你需要在开始前就调整好。

除了炮台种类，和地形策略上，这个作品所主打的射击其实就是控制一个小飞机，有点像塔防里英雄的存在？事实上这个小飞机还是十分强力的，它有三种不同的升级可以满足它对空/对地/平衡的战略需求，而且在输出性能上也相对Imba，在战略层面最可贵的无非是小飞机的机动性和随时变幻武器的灵活性，在早期资源点数较少的情况下，小飞机甚至可以在单独守住一路的情况下随时支援战场上的任何一处弱点。

那么这个游戏依然有美中不足的地方，比如键盘操作时（没体验手柄），小飞机通过Shift切换成建造和吸取资源的特定模式非常非常非常的不顺手，尤其是战况紧张的时候，有时候切成建造模式会反应不过来再切回来，这样小飞机的操作有中断感，不够流畅，这是非常可惜的！

画面上来说算是很精致的塔防了，各种爆炸粒子，有点红警3的感觉- -！整体来说并不是一个特别大体量的游戏，我觉得也许归为小品类游戏会更好？有如之前所说，难度并不高，而且没想象中那种紧迫感，也许作为一个偏休闲的塔防游戏来看待它更好？

最终体验下来，我认为这是一款十分有意思的塔防游戏，可能我玩的塔防并不多，我觉得对我来说还是很新颖的模式，看了下定价稍微有点贵，真要说制作水准的话，我觉得还是值这个价格，不过考虑到单人玩法的内容，也许等到四十左右会更好？

最后补充一点，游戏支持多人联机，共同抵御进攻，各自独立资源，以前玩过魔兽RPG塔防的朋友应该知道这种感觉，应该会很有意思！

38138526.review:
I can absolutely recommend this for fans of top-down/twin-stick shooters AND tower defense games. You should be a fan of both to really enjoy it, as you probably will have a hard time getting by on only one of the mechanisms. The tower defense part includes mazing, and a relatively small selection of towers without stat upgrades, and a very basic resource system. The emphasis is much more on the actual mazing part and type-countering the attackers with the appropriate defenses, instead of a more standard formula (usually "slow and splash", followed by something to kill off the fewer, stronger units that made it through the initial killbox(es)).

The game is pretty hard, even on medium. Luckily, the controls work pretty well, the game telegraphs most information very clearly, so it's rarely frustrating (or at least rarely feels unfair, even if it's sometimes frustrating, because hard), although targeting is sometimes a bit off with a lot of enemies on screen, especially with some weapons. 

Since there's also a persistent upgrades system, you can play some optional missions to increase your power and might face difficulty if you don't, and you may want to revisit a level later, when you've acquired more upgrades, as this will help you improve your score. The game does rate your performance along four metrics - how much damage your core sustained, how often you were killed, how long you took and how much debris you collected (which is possibly with one of the first upgrades and increases the resource count) - and awards medals (silver, bronze, that kind of stuff) - it also tells you on the mission end screen how good or bad you did compared to other players in percent.
If you do fail a few times, the "you lose" screen will contain a video of how mazing in a level could look like to be successful. 

The moment-to-moment gameplay, within a mission, is comprised of your combat craft, which has two modes: 
In one mode, you're invisible and invulnerable, move fast and can pass through objects, and you can build, move, upgrade and sell towers, as well as collect debris. In the other mode, you can use up to four different weapons with two firing modes and one additional upgrade (that's usually a passive upgrade to the second weapon attack) to directly kill foes. The shooter part of the game is pretty satisfying - you can combine it with your TD strategy in different ways, and it will have calm tactical moments as well as frenetic bullet-hell ones.

Your towers come in one basic form that can be upgraded into four advanced types, of which one may be upgraded into two different more-advanced types, as noted above, there's no stat upgrades, so no level 1, 2 or 3 making a tower just more powerful - the point is to have the right kinds of towers in the right places to counter the attack. The resource system is simple: A tower costs one resource, an upgrade costs another resource. If a tower is sold or gets destroyed by one of the few foes that can do that, you get all the resources back. This is especially useful - I'd even say necessary - as the name of the game is at the core of the gameplay: Enemies do not only attack in different compositions each wave, but also come from different spawn points, usually requiring the player to re-adjust (morph) the defenses a bit between each wave. The player has unlimited time between waves (however, time taken is rated as a performance criterion) and upgraded towers can be switched to other upgrades with two clicks (without loss of resources or additional costs) or even moved around the battlefield.

The player only has limited resources, though, usually ranging from a handful to two or three dozen, generally low numbers - in fact, the game doesn't even display them as numbers, but as blips or energy fields. To allow for mazing, most maps don't have too much open space and instead have something of a network of routes that can be used, and it's possible to span a laser fence between any two towers within a certain range from each other at no additional cost. Also, the secondary attack of one weapon allows to blow up the base of some tall buildings to collapse them onto the path, or to destroy bridges. To facilitate this, this secondary attack has no recharge during the breaks between waves.

If you like tower defense games - it's probably something different to you, but you might like it.
If you like top-down shooters - you'll probably like it if you don't HATE the tower defense concept.
If you like both, and a challenge at them - you'll likely have a good time with this one.

37912584.review:
First I want to mention that recently noticed that almost all of the positive things I mention below are the benefits of a recent big patch, so gratz on the great work!

This game is awesome so far. Perfect mix of maze-TD (you are able to setup enemy routes) and a fast paced aircraft shooter.
- Perspective:
we are the invaders. That's actually cool. Playing a defense game while beeing the agressor is a better feeling than just playing defense to save our lives.
- Keybindings and abilities:
are well thought, you can easily build, change weapons, maneuver, collect scrap and use abilities without strugle. This is a key element why I think that this game is so good and playable. After 20-30 min I was able to fly over incoming lane while bombing the ground forces, build a tower, switch to plasma, use shield to mitigate incomming missiles and charge up laser and shoot the big tanks and all of this happened under 5 seconds.
- Mission time:
One mission can be quite long (20-60 mins) but there is autosave between each wave and the action is so tense that this time seems like 5-10 mins max. There is unlimited time to plan between each wave (and you might need some because the map is chaning).
- Enemy types:
Nothing what we haven't seen before. Ground only, can fly, small but fast, heavy but slow, can damage your towers, can shortcut, etc. We also have to face bosses. Now this is where the epic feels and sweet memories of top-down shooters come in mind. Maneuvering around a biiig fat boss, dodging projectiles, hide behind environment, basically destroying the city during the fight is awesome
- Resource:
Not sure about the exact value but ~70% from raw killing and ~30% from collecting scraps. You can't shoot during the collect but you are invulnerable and the change between the (let's stay) stances is super quick and comfortable.
You don't have money but have a bar which you can fill up. Every filled box can be used for either placing a tower or upgrading one. Towers can be moved freely, sold for 100% and destroyed towers also refound 100%. This might sound lame and easy but you gonna need it, as the incoming direction and routes are always changing.
- Maze:
You can create maze (aka change route) with towers and a free option to put laser fences between close towers. You can also manipulate the environment to create blocks. Like bombing a bridge, or demolishing a building. Here I would like to mention the physics of the game. You can really nicely calculate the falling angle of the building (it's like cutting a tree), so you can precisely block the route you want to block (a building can fall to 8 direction minimum as I experienced). Or you can chop of trees but this is just for the show :) Speaking of the show...
- Graphics:
Amazing.. Super high quality, nice water, nice shadows, nice effects (explosion wave, heat, smoke, blowing scraps). Not sure about the true requirements, but on my GTX1070 and i7 on full settings had smooth fps (not checked but shall be ~80-90)
- UI:
Really really well thought. Minimap and its small icons, route symbols, small icons at the edge of the screen, enemy radio messages are really easy to understand and we need it because a mixage of 8 routes would be a headache without these :)

CONS:
So far nothing. I might mention that it's not free, but the price is really low, you can have 1 month WoW subscription for the same.
//A PRO of this that because it's not free, it doesn't have adds.

For me, it was really worth the price.

37570270.review:
8/10 ▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓░░

Un excellent Shooter Tower Defense en vue de dessus avec une destruction de l'environnement impressionnant.

En gros, on joue aux côtés des envahisseurs aliens qui veulent investir les ressources de la terre et on incarne un chasseur polymorphe pour protéger le récolteur contre les humains qui envoient toute une armée.

Le jeu suit un peu le même principe que Sanctum, on forme un labyrinthe pour rendre le trajet des lignes ennemies le plus long possible, on peut même renverser des immeubles ou diverses structures pour bloquer le chemin.

Le moteur du jeu est impressionnant et nous offre un niveau de destruction très détaillé et sans causer de perte de framerate pour moi qui possède un PC de milieu de gamme.

Le jeu offre 13 niveaux avec une difficulté progressive est des technologies à débloquer au fur et à mesure qui peut faire tenir 14 heures, bien que le jeu m'a donné du fil à retordre à plusieurs occasions en difficulté normale.

Le jeu offre aussi un éditeur de niveau, mais il n’y a aucun tutoriel concernant l'outil, ce qui fait que personne ne sait vraiment comment s'en servir et que le Steam Workshop est plutôt vide.


Les développeurs nous promettent un nouveau mode de jeu à venir ainsi que du nouveau contenu.

37049199.review:
Good mix of shoot'em up and tower defense (!). Took me ~14 hours to complete on easy mode.  Not sure about the game's replayability, to be honest, so I doubt I'll be doing it again (on a harder setting).  I find the gameplay rather relaxed and slow on easy mode (not a bad thing), with a nice balance of shooter action and stragety planning. Each map is split into several waves, allowing for planning and building towers undisturbed.

The 3D top-down graphics are detailed for such a small game, with an atmospheric audio design. Voice acting is also decent. 

It's a shame there are no other  game modes, and it has a rather low number of maps. I'd love to see more tower types and a larger selection of weapons (or even weapon upgrades). There is a coop mode, but afaik you simply play the main campaign and it offers no new maps.

Camera angles are a bit awkward at times (when enemies come from the bootom of the screen), but that's part of the challenge, I'd guess.

Worth full price? Nah, not really for so few hours of gameplay. Get it when it's at 50% off.

I'm not even a fan of Tower Defense games, I've always found them to be an easy gimmick but this was fantastic. The perfect blend of a Tower Defense, Puzzle Game, and Top-Down Shooter. Sound hard? Sure can be, but if you want something more casual then start on easy and watch the spectacular fireworks. The learning curve is 'perfect' and the progression of depth feels outstanding and so natural.

Так же присутсвует модификация морфа и ядра, которые позволяют слегка упростить и разнообразить гемплей. Хотя если говорить про вооружение морфа и модификации башен, они играю жизненно важную роль, иначе вы просто не сможете пройти некоторые задания, вы тупо не пробьете тяжелую технику.
Компания на 12-15 часов игры, что довольно неплохо в то время игра проходилась бодро и не давала заскучать.
Довольно разнообразные и уникальные враги. Воздушные, кузнечики и наземные. Большинство врагов медлительные что в свою очередь компенсируется тяжелой броней и количеством, а так же смертоностностью оружия.
Абсолютная разрушаемость и классная физика придает игре новые возможности для планирование лабиринта, ведь обломки могут перекрыть путь для наступления или же наооборот придавить крупную технику и выиграть время. Мосты, небоскребы, цистерны все может упасть на головы ваших врагов. (Вас это тоже касается).
Мир выглядит очень красиво, эффекты от оружия и взрывов тоже на высоком уровне.
Уникальные боссы.
Из минусов разве что немного сюжет странный. По сюжету земляне выглядят откровенно тупыми, не способные  противостоять такой откровенно слабой угрозе при всей своей мощи.

[b] 
Очень редкий представитель своего жанра, тяежло найти что то подобное. Лучшее из TD что я играл за всю свою жизнь.
Игра стоит денег потраченных на нее. Берите, о своей покупке вы не пожалеете 
[/b]

Beyond impressive and worth both the money and time.

How the physics engine handles debris and collapsing buildings is fantastic, not just that they also block paths. That you gather debries from destroyed units makes it even more satisfying.

The levels are masterfully crafted. You adapt, your enemies adapt, your towers adapt, the environment adapts under the destruction, this game can not possibly get boring.

The game doesn't force you into the active fighter part, you can engage them with your ship if you want the game lets you play how you want.

The towers are indestructible, only certain boss units can destroy them.

Buy this game now. If you are hesitant watch the trailers then buy the game now. If you aren't a fan of tower defence games buy this game regardless. Heck even if you're not a fan of video games buy the game anyway and get a boner from the physics.

May I also applaud the fact that there was not a single crash, not a single bug and not a single glitch in all that time while having more levolution and physics and destruction going on than some shitty 70$ aaa game.

Played for 7 hours after buying it. Straight. No pause. Have to sleep... don't want to. Game is good.

We came, we saw, we got bored real fast.

This is a very pretty looking bundle of 'Meh' that rapidly decends into a pointless grindfest. 
Now, I enjoy the occasional bullet hell, but this lacks the neon overload and thumping soundtrack that make a good 10 min shooter. We havn't even got a good TD with underpowered turrets, limited build points amd level design that only allows for limited redirection of creeps.

Score penalty on the first level for not using a technology you can't unlock untill the second level? Really? And no, that's not 'replayability'.

Now, the first boss was fun, but only served to highlight the lack of vareity in the next two levels. At that point I lost the will to continue.

If there is ever a playable demo you'll have seen all there is to see here. Or save yourself the bother and go fire up Destroy all Humans on your emulator of choise to satisfy you UFO destruction needs.

36331889.review:
X-Morph: Defence is an interesting combination of tower defence and shoot-em-up gameplay, where you play as an alien race who are invading Earth. Each mission begins with a spaceship landing on the planet surface, which then becomes your core. Human military forces attack in waves, by land and air, along specified paths. You need to place towers along their paths to destroy them before they can destroy your core. You also control a small flying ship, allowing you to move quickly around the map, assisting your towers with destroying the enemy.

You can build seven different types of towers. Plasma is rapid fire, but does weak damage (similar to a machine gun), flamethrowers are good against infantry, artillery has long range and can fire over obstacles, lasers are useful against strong armour, and there are three varieties of anti-air. You can create a laser fence between two towers that are close together, to block the enemy and shape their path, creating a maze to slow them down. Meanwhile your ship can equip four weapons, including plasma, anti-air missiles, lasers, and bombs which can destroy buildings to block the enemy path with rubble. Each of your weapons can be charged up to fire a more powerful alternate attack.

The Humans have a decent variety of units. Some of them focus on attacking your core (infantry, APCs, tanks, mechs), some will try to destroy your towers (artillery, bombers) and some will attack your ship (mobile anti-air, fighter jets, choppers). Advanced infantry and mechs are equipped with jetpacks to enable them to jump over your fences, or small gaps in the terrain. And a few missions end with you fighting a massive boss vehicle. If your ship is destroyed, you respawn at the core after a few seconds, but if your core is destroyed, you lose the mission. There’s a checkpoint at the start of each wave, so you don’t need to restart the entire mission.

Between waves you can take as much time as you want to plan your defences, and you’ll certainly need to take advantage of it. The Humans constantly change their strategy from one wave to the next, attacking from different directions and with different combinations of units, requiring you to design almost an entirely new defensive tactic for each wave. Fortunately you don’t lose resources for selling and repositioning towers. You can also build new towers, or change their attack types, during waves. You build towers in “ghost mode” where the enemy can’t hurt you, and this can also be useful as a defensive strategy to avoid incoming enemy fire.

Each completed mission rewards you with upgrade points to spend in a tech tree. Each of the towers and weapons mentioned above have to be unlocked. You can also unlock upgrades for your core, such as more health and the ability to shoot nearby enemies. Another important ability allows you to collect scrap from destroyed enemies, which adds to your available resources, allowing you to construct more towers.

I enjoy playing tower defence games, and I especially like those where you can control a character and directly attack enemies – games such as Sanctum and Orcs Must Die. You’re always involved in the action, and X-Morph can get particularly intense. There’s also an interesting tactical twist, as you figure out how to balance the workload between yourself and your towers.

If you feel the same way, then I strongly recommend picking up X-Morph. It took me 13 hours to finish the campaign, which includes a total of 14 missions, so there’s enough content to justify a full price purchase. However you might want to wait for a couple more patches, as I’ve crashed to desktop on two occasions (fortunately those frequent checkpoints meant that I didn’t lose much progress).

This game is really good. It has a solid balance between shmup and tower defense without either one overpowering the other. It is worth your time and money.

Only complaints would be (and they are minor complaints):
-Lack of a skip for the cut scenes. There is a fast forward button but sometimes it would be better to just click skip.

-Some of the early "tutorial" parts are a little jarring since you don't have access to or know all the tools like debris collecting or anti-matter bombs (but one cutscenes give you one temporarily) but that ends after the first mission.

-Due to controller support, tower management uses a radial wheel. This can make tower interaction a little tedious with mkb but at the same time, it does play into the game balance making it more difficult to swap towers around when the crap hits the fan. I'd say it still plays fine into the overall design of the game.

-I'd like there to be a survival mode of some sort as dlc later 

For now I say buy it and give this dev some love and support for their work! It's good stuff!

35286474.review:
Twinstick Shooters and Tower Defense finally had a cute baby!

First off, this game is gorgeous. This is probably one of the most graphically impressive indie games I have played this year. The physics engine adds so much to the atmosphere and levels, since you can demolish areas to create new paths. This makes the TD mechanics very satisfying as you maze around the entire map. After setting up your defense, you get to fight the enemy waves yourself. In some ways I would compared it to a 2D dungeon defenders, and I mean that in the best way.

The action is non-stop with a good sprinkling of strategy thrown into the mix. If you like TD games or Twin Stick Shooters, you should definitely give this game a try!

35262186.review:
難易度ノーマルクリア記念
タワーディフェンスと全方位STG混ぜたらめちゃくちゃ面白いゲームになったよ！って感じ
似た者同士としてはオークマストダイとかサンクタムみたいなタワーの設置と自機の操作で敵を蹴散らすタイプです。

ストーリーは地球を侵略する宇宙人と人類が存亡の危機を賭けて戦うマイケル・ベイ監督作品でよくあるありきたりなもの。
珍しいのがプレイヤーが操作するのは侵略側の宇宙人であるということ。
これまたマイケル・ベイ監督作品よろしく内容は無いに等しいので過度な期待はしないほうが吉。

システムはタワーディフェンスでよくあるタイプのWAVE制で、宇宙人が各都市の町中に空からぶっ刺した
侵略拠点のコアをめがけてやってくる軍隊をプラズマ砲やら反物質爆弾やら詰んだかっこいいエイリアン戦闘機の自機と
インターバルの間にタワーを設置し、タワー同士をレーザーフェンスで繋ぎ進路を作ったりと
せっせと準備をし、いざWAVEが始まったら表示されたルートから現れる敵を自機とタワーで殲滅すると言った感じです。
（WAVE中もタワー設置は可能）

WAVE中は自機めがけて飛んでくる戦闘機の処理やタワーが倒し損ねた敵を倒す、というよりタワーだけで敵を捌き切るのは無理なので西へ東へと赴くのですが
数とやってくる方向が様々な上、森が燃えたらそこから戦車が通ってきたりと戦況に応じてルートを変えてきたりするのでハチャメチャに忙しい。
自身のタワーディフェンスとシューティングの腕前とマルチタスク処理能力が存分に試される骨太難易度です。

また独自開発のエンジンを使っている破壊表現も魅力。
マップ上のほぼ全てのオブジェクトが破壊可能であり、時間さえかければ美しい都市を更地に変える事もできる。
ただの表現だけではなく有効活用できる場面も有り、例えば高層ビルを爆弾でなぎ倒し、敵の進路に横たわれば
敵の進路を塞ぐことが出来、レーザーフェンスを節約することが可能である。
建物の倒壊の描写は他のどのゲームと比べても群を抜いており、破壊衝動の強い人は無条件で買うべき。


タワーディフェンス好き、シューティング好き、物珍しいゲーム好き、やりごたえのあるゲーム好きは定価でも買うべき。

35174612.review:
https://youtu.be/on9hNi_uVr4


Xmorph defense s’est présenté à moi comme un tower defense mais en réalité, il s’agit plus d’un shoot’em up auquel 
viendrait se greffer une petite dose de tower defense, toi aussi apprend à dévier les ennemis de leur trajectoire pour qu’ils mettent plus de temps a atteindre l’objectif qui leur est assigné. Les tours sont principalement là pour vous soutenir dans votre objectif, elles ne vont pas faire le gros du travail comme dans la majorité des TD. Elles seront surtout la comme « bloqueur de chemin » pour augmenter le trajet des ennemis.
En effet, dans ce jeu, c’est vous et votre vaisseau qui allez devoir faire 90 % du boulot sous peine de vous voir submergé par des ennemis extrêmement nombreux. Le jeu ne vous laisse aucun répit : des ennemis variés, en surnombre, qui viennent rapidement de multiples directions différentes.

Si vous ne disposez pas de réflexes surhumains vous permettant d’éviter la pléthore de projectiles qui sera envoyé dans votre direction, évitez d’y jouer. Je me répète mais il s’agit bien plus d’un shoot em up que d’un TD.

Votre vaisseau dispose de trois modes d’attaque : air sol/air, air air, air sol, chacun disposant de sa propre liste d’attaque et de compétences, déblocables avec les points reçus lors de la réussite des missions.

Les améliorations sont disponibles pour le « cœur » et pour les tourelles également mais elles sont peu nombreuses, renforçant encore un peu plus le fait que le but premier des développeurs n’était pas de faire un TD.

Si l’aspect TD est pour le moins lacunaire, on ne pourra pas en dire autant de l’enrobage technique qui lui est excellent : de beaux graphismes et un moteur physique qui permet la destruction environnementale de nombreux éléments du décor, permettant même de bloquer certains passages sans avoir à placer des tours : pratique, satisfaisant et bien foutu

L’aspect sonore n’est pas aussi percutant mais il tient la route, j’ai toujours beaucoup de difficultés à juger l’aspect sonore d’un jeu mais ici, les explosions sont de bonne facture, la musique reste discrète, les voix sont correctes, rien à redire.

Niveau contenu : une dizaine de missions longues et exigeantes, même en normal : le jeu vous laisse très peu d’opportunités de reprendre votre souffle, vous offre très peu de ressources pour construire vos tours et votre vaisseau n’est pas vraiment un modèle de solidité, même si vous vous régénérez (en normal, pas en difficile).

Dlc de prévu et workshop disponible même s’il est globalement déserté vu que le jeu ne semble pas rencontrer un franc succès.

Avis global : bon Sh’mup, qui a de la gueule, qui va vous demander une certaine dextérité et une abnégation à toute épreuve, particulièrement si vous visez la médaille d’or sur chaque mission, un vrai casse-tête.

A mentionner : Pour une fois, le joueur est l’envahisseur de la planète terre et les humains sont les ennemis.

■ 操作性
ゲームパッド前提のUIが用意されており、ストレスなく操作できる。タワーの位置決めなどはマウスの方が楽だろうと思うけど、十分耐えられる。

■ 育成要素
ほぼ無し。ステージクリアでもらえる二種類のポイントで、機体やタワーの機能を増やす程度でレベリングは無し。最後までポイントもらって全機能使えるようにしてから初期ステージをやり直してゴールドとかとるくらい。

■ TDとして
ビルド専用時間もあり、資源の再利用性も高く、フェンスを使った迷路作成で試行錯誤できて楽しい。ウェーブ中は資源は自分で回収し、その場でビルドもできる。

■ シューティングとして
ガンシップ撃ってると地上から狙撃されたりとそれなりに忙しい。EASYだとそんなに撃墜されない。

■ 総評
イージークリアなら比較的短時間。ゴールドとかとろうとするとそれなりにやり込みが必要だけど、シューティングが苦手だとコンプは難しいかも。機体のレベリングができないので時間をかけて中の人がレベルアップしないと勝つ事もできない。値段的には半額くらい。有名どころのTDを持っていない場合、セールでこちらより安ければ先にそちらをお勧め。

35025158.review:
X-Morph: Defense - довольно хардкорный Tower Defense в непревычном и очень драйвовом сеттинге от молодой, но перспективной студии разработчиков EXOR Studios. Кстати, эта студия выпустила довольно популярную игрушку Zombie Driver HD.

[b][url=http://store.steampowered.com/curator/11769719/]Полноценные обзоры на вкусняшки[/url] | [url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/220820/Zombie_Driver_HD/]Zombie Driver HD[/url] | [url=https://discordapp.com/channels/355050114466709504/355050114466709505]Общение с обзорщиками[/url][/b]

[h1][i]СЮЖЕТ И ДЕЙСТВИЕ[/i][/h1]
Скажу сразу: “Я терпеть не могу Tower Defense”, сразу после нескольких десятков часов игры в Sanctum забросил этот жанр игр, ибо они начинали гнуть одно и тоже в разных оболочках. По сути практически каждый Tower Defense преследует одну и ту же цель: “Не дать своей башни загнуться от толп монстров, техники и прочей ерунды”. Вот скажите кто в здравом уме наиграет сотни и тысячи часов в постоянно повторяющейся игре? Вы: “А как же ДОТОЧКА?”. Я: “Оу… ну е-мое...”. Но, не суть важно. 

Просто захотелось сделать такую вводную, чтобы вы, дорогой читатель, поняли одну простую истину: “Тауэрки меня давно выбесили”. Но, вернемся к нашим барашкам, а вернее к инопланетным захватчикам. Да, да, на сей раз нам предстоит защищать не доблестное человечество, которое так миролюбиво швыряет атомненькие бомбочки на голову друг друга, естественно во имя мира и любви. Данный проект предлагает нам напялить на себя шкуру злобных инопланетных захватчиков, которые нападают на бедных беззащитных людишек. И вот нам предстоит выдержать 5-6 волн этих совершенно уси-пусичек на танках, вертолетах, роботах и прочей техники, которая сделана во имя добра, конечно же, всего одним самым опасным и кровожадным самолетиком в галактике. 

Но слава Зорду, нам на помощь приходят боевые башни, которые нам позволяют расставлять по всей длине карты, но не забывайте, что противник может нанести удар ЛЮБОВЬЮ с разных сторон. В этом и состоит вся завязка: “Захватываем город за городом во имя злых сил и вселенского господства… ну или просто так.”. Вот поставили вы защитные барьеры, расставили мегаэпичные пушки по всей длине карты и пришло время действия… Вот тут можете и попрощаться с вашей челюстью, ведь она упадет так глубоко и, вероятней всего, проломит не один этаж вашей многоэтажки. Повторюсь в сотый раз, я не люблю TD, но от этой игры у меня просто сорвало башню, в прямом смысле этого слова. От количества взрывов эпилепсия может заставить даже здоровых людей дергаться в нервном припадке, но ваш внутренний ребенок будет визжать как мелкая ш… шиш-кебаб… от восторга.

[h1][i]ГЕЙМПЛЕЙ[/i][/h1]
Казалось бы, что может быть банальнее в геймплейной части нежели очередная TD? Ну, разве что очередной раннер или наш любименький Калл Оф Даюти. Но, как я и говорил ранее, помимо простого расставления башен по периметру, у нас есть возможность пилотировать мегодевайс с огромным количеством вооружения, которое можно менять прямо во время боя. Вы: “Пф… вообще не удивил!”. Я: “ФИЗИКА!!! Абсолютно все, что есть на карте можно разрушить, или обвалить на врага!!!”. Танки прутся по прямой линии где у вас нет турелей? Не беда, завалите на их пути небоскреб и беднягам придется искать другие пути к вашей часовни. На вас двигается мегасупероптимуспрайм? Хераните по его тупой головешке огромным баком с топливом и поджарьте его Автоботскую жопень, вместе с Майклом Бейем!!! Ладно, на счет последнего слегка соврал, но если откроется мастерская стима… В общем писец вам автоботы гадские!!! Естественно кроме Бамблби, ведь он такой лапочка, прям у-тю-тю. 

Вначале все кажется довольно простым, на вас пруться танки и простая машинная техника, которую можно довольно таки легко разрушить, но позже все усложняется авиацией и боссами. Авиация представлена здесь в нескольких видах: штурмовые вертолеты, десантная техника, истребители, бомбардировщики (по крайней мере это те, что я успел нарыть за 3,5 часа. Сразу извиняюсь за столь малое время игры, на работе сейчас жуткий кабздец). И если вертолеты и десантная техника особо не вредят вашим башням, то бомбардировщики в состоянии разрушить каждую вашу башню. Такую технику, по понятным причинам, лучше пресекать на корню, но что если одновременно было выпущено по 10 бомбардировщиков с трех разных сторон? Авиация это, как оказалось, пол беды, вот боссы в игре действительно довольно сложные. Посудите сами первый босс, с которым нужно будет сразиться - меготанк размером с несколько многоэтажек… Даже если свалить ему на бошку небоскреб вместе со скалой (Ну или Дуэйном Джонсоном), он может не хило так разозлиться и убежать…  Ну или надавать вам тумаков с рокетлаунчера или лазерного орудия. В общем геймплей этой игры из разряда: “Хрен наскучит”.

[h1][i]ГРАФИКА И ЗВУКИ[/i][/h1]
Я ожидал очень красочную и динамичную графику внутри игры, но никак не ожидал настолько проработанное главное меню. Сразу видно что разработкой занимается не аматорская группа разработчиков, а перспективные разработчики, у которых за плечами есть уже довольно удачный проект. Графика выглядит просто шикарно, каждый сантиметр игровой локации можно разрушить, поджечь или вообще разхреначит к чертовой бульбульки. Это стопроцентный фан, когда у вас есть вседозволенность и вашей самой главной целью является не допустить врагов к ядру, а то как вы будете это делать, в одиночку, с другом, или с помощью башен - игре плевать. Прорисовка всей Земной техники просто впечатляет, такой любви к мелким деталям может позавидовать сам Спилберг, а главный корабль, которым нам и предстоит управлять выполнен просто на отлично. Всевозможные трансформации летающего аппарата и та боевая мощь, с которой он уничтожает своих врагов - просто потрясает. Ну и как вишенка на торте графолюбителей - полная разрушаемость карты. Как же это кайфово сравнять с землей многоэтажное здание или взорвать к чертям местную заправочную станцию. Но куда большего восторга всегда доставляет бой с боссами, это даже некое искусство разрушения, не хватает лишь Баха или Бетховена, которые как нельзя кстати пришлись бы здесь. 

Единственный момент в игре, который действительно можно назвать провальным - это звуковое сопровождение. С одной стороны взрывы, звучат как и должны звучать, но с другой стороны не хватает динамического музыкального сопровождения. Ох как бы хотелось в данной игре услышать бессмертные хиты легендарной группы AC/DC (сугубо мое мнение, но это было бы действительно шикарно и запоминающе). Хотя нельзя сказать, что звуковое сопровождение полностью сгубило проект, это чисто по моему личному мнению оно могло бы быть лучше, хотя вполне возможно кому-то может и зайти. Я действительно искал минусы игры, но для ТД - игра просто поразительно успешна. И еще один плюсик уходит разрабам за частые обновления и патчи.

[h1][i]ПЛЮСЫ И МИНУСЫ[/i][/h1]
Плюсы:
+ Нестандартный подход к истории
+ Большой арсенал оружия и башен
+ Много обычных мобов и красочные босс-баттлы
+ Потрясающий геймплей
+ Возможна игра в кооперативы
+ Красочная графическая составляющая
+ EXPLOSIONS
+ Русская локализация присутствует

34904312.review:
X-morph is a hybrid TD/space-shooter hybrid.  Remember the old Atari game Space Invaders?  It's basically the same type of gameplay.  Waves of enemys approach, and you shoot projectiles at them to defend  your base.  

The graphics are fun.  The maps are interactive with destructable bridges and buildings etc.  The physics look great for a small-budget game, and overall it has a nice feel.

Unfortunately, it's not polished.  In the 3 hours of game play that I've accumulated, I've encountered two game-ending crashes, and at least one brick wall on the campaign progression.  The crashes are pretty self-explanitory.  I was playing the campaign mode, when suddenly the game closed itself and a debug report appeared on my screen.  While those incidents are annoying, I'm confident the developer team will eventually fix them.  The brick wall occured when I played the "Germany" phase of the campaign (I think it's the third level).  Each time a player starts a new phase, he/she chooses some specific tech upgrades and tower types.  For the first time, I had the option to choose a fire tower, so naturally I chose that because it seemed like it would be fun to try something new.  Unfortunately, progressing through the Germany phase requires air towers and by choosing fire, I had to disable air - which meant the phase became literally impossible.  No, it's not a "get good noob" type of situation, it's just simply impossible to defeat that phase if a player chooses fire towers rather than air towers.  This is a broken brick wall that should have been addressed prior to the game's release.  The point is, that the game is kind of sloppy.

X-morph has a few other problems as well.  The foremost is the reliance on the space-invaders gameplay.  As a TD, you might expect that the towers you build will do the majority of bad-guy killing work. However, that's not the case.  On most stages, it feels like the towers are secondary, and the player-controlled builder kills the majority of the invaders.  It feels like the tower building is secondary to the player-controlled blasting.  Ultimately, the towers didn't really even matter because I was killing everyting with my ship anyway.  Furthermore, progression in the campaign mode is slow.  The tech is awarded at a turtle pace.  You'll be clearing 6+ mini-levels before you get a new shooting weapon or tower type.  I'm only 3 hours in, and I'm already bored.  

Overall, with the gameplay relying so heavily on point-and-click spaceship shooting, I can't recommend X-morph.  Hopefully, after they fix the bugs and crashes, they developers will tweak the game to make it more of a TD and less of a shooter... but until that happens, I can't really recommend X-morph.

34837963.review:
This game has been an absolute blast! Totally worth $20, I would have paid more honestly. If you're on the fense try it and you'll know within an hour if this is your game or not. If not just refund before the hour is up but I'm betting you won't. I've had no major issues/glitches running the game. 

I've seen lots of this was an easy or hard game. On the normal difficulty setting, I'd say for the average gamer this is going to be challenging and take some strategizing to win some levels. For those of you who have played Sanctum or Grid Defense this game will feel right at home. This is kind of like a hybrid of those two games. Figuring out how to use your weapons and utilize your charge ability to its best is a must. If you get stuck on a level just think about what you aren't doing or take a break and come back to it. Odds are you need to move/change your towers around more inbetween rounds. You're playing a strategy game, use your noggin to win. Co-op in this game is so much fun. I wish it was online with friends but communication would be an issue. Boss battles are just brilliant. I can't get enough of them. I haven't made it to the final level yet but I hope it is absolute insanity. The environments themselves feel very interactive. Sometimes you have to destroy things to alter paths and other times you need to be careful not to destroy bridges.

I wish there were more games like this out there. This is one of those once in a blue moon tower games that are an absolute gem. If you own Sanctum or Grid Defense my question is why isn't this already in your library? I want to say more about this game but all this talk makes want to get back to gaming so have fun conquering the Earth. Muh hahaha!

34818896.review:
Remember how Project Root was suppose to remind us of the old Jungle/Desert/Urban Stike games and failed?

Throw in the Tower Defense mechanics, and this feels like those classics, not so much in the map objective department, but in every other way, at least for me.

Pros:
Controls are smooth. (using DS4 here)
Graphics are well polished.
Tough at times, but not unforgiving.
Bosses are fun and diverse.
Destructable buildings can be used for path alteration (nice touch devs!)

Cons:
Occasional bug; have had a couple enemies become invisible and stuck, it's rare, and you can see them on the minimap and attack them, but your towers won't.
Building mid-wave with the recources you've collected can be headache inducing. Time doesn't slow during build mode (ghost), so trying to pop down a couple fresh towers on a far lane, can be really painful if you need your ship attacking a different lane to stop it from getting overwhelmed. 

If you're looking for some classic casual action, with a modern paintjob, and a mix of well mashed mechanics, check it out.

(Really hoping for some DLC here.)

34818802.review:
这是第二篇测评，第一篇因为玩的太激动，评价的比较敷衍，用语也不咋的标准

1.画面
这种上帝视角的画面就应该rts，moba游戏进行对比，显然，这是我近几年玩过画面最好之一的上帝视角游戏，特别是爆炸和建筑倒塌的效果，各方面都做得非常棒。物理碰撞和破坏效果做的比战地还丰富，战地破坏方面，除了能炸出弹坑哪方面比得过这个游戏
但是也有一个很大的缺点，就是土的不行的ui。我认为科幻风不应该做成这样，近来不是流行扁平化风格吗，学学全境封锁是个不错的选择（除非制作组想体现外星人的土

2.剧情
没错，我说的是剧情。这个游戏是有剧情的，但实际上可有可无，因为他不影响关卡的进行。但是高质量且严肃的配音，不得不让我重视剧情起来了。
外星人为了活动资源，入侵了地球并大肆破坏。而人类一次次对外星人学习和反抗，但最终无力阻止外星人的入侵，被迫离开家园，在月球看着地球的资源被剥夺。这一段深深的触动到我了，我非常期待能有续作，能作为人类夺回自己的家园（老实说我写出这段的时候心情挺激动的）
可能没有展现出一些设定的东西（比如核弹被反），如果人类真像我们玩到的那样对外星人进行排队枪毙的人海战术，我只能说活该被赶出地球

3.游戏性
塔防，雷电
这就是这个游戏的两大亮点，而且玩家能用两个炮塔建立的栏杆，使敌方地面部队转移路线，理论上能无限延长敌人的进攻路线，倒塌的建筑也能阻挡敌人的前进路线，但是敌人必须有一条能到达的基地的路线，否则阻挡路线的那一组炮塔会无法建立栏杆，倒塌建筑的废墟也会被强制消除（这个最蛋疼，因为废墟消失或者破坏了是无法恢复的，除非重开一局游戏，注意，不是读档）
这个机制的存在能让玩家每次休息的时候都能思考怎样才能最大化的延长路线，并且让炮塔进行最大限度的火力输出（有时候准备阶段消耗的时间不亚于敌人进攻的时间
游戏流程略短了，单轮通关的话很快就能打完，而且难度也不是很高，包括困难难度，创意工坊几乎一片空白，我发这篇测评的时候只看到一个地图（而且看起来很像加拿大那一张图）
中国最后一回合是难度最高的一关，需要极高的操作才能让基地保持75%以上的血量。目前已经剧情全金了

我能评价的就这么多，音乐什么的我倒是不敏感，所以不评价，但至少能让游戏过程不会耳聋
总的来说，这是非常棒的一款游戏，他有精美的画质，优秀的配音，新颖的游戏机制，如果对rts，雷电，塔防其中一样有兴趣的，都可以尝试一下（至于为什么说rts，是因为这游戏的画面让我想起了以及逝去的红警和命令与征服）
游戏68块钱我觉得不是问题，游戏质量值这个钱，虽然流程是短了点，但我觉得游玩过程会让你收齐性价比的想法。

最后，让我再次说一次，请务必出续作，而且我要作为人类的视角夺回自己的家园

34813696.review:
首先要感谢奶牛关野蔷薇，以及制作方所提供的steam key。
完整版链接：https://cowlevel.net/game/X-Morph/review/2705399

    《X-Morph: Defense》是一款带有双摇杆射击要素的塔防游戏。玩家将指挥外星人入侵地球，操纵外星战机并建造防御炮塔以抵御人类们潮水般的攻势，并利用X-Morph挖掘机榨干地球各个部分的能源。本作画面炫丽、科幻感强、爆炸效果不错，操作爽快且刺激，上手与通关剧情模式难度不大，策略与建筑格局将直接决定游戏的成败。本作自带创意工坊与游戏编辑器，可允许玩家自建关卡，未来仍有潜力。



评价：

画面：9/10

楼宇、桥梁、敌人，战机搭载的暗物质炸弹将允许你把游戏中所见的大多数东西全部炸成碎片。游戏优化很好，在游戏的3D俯视视角下，即便敌人和场景中的瓦砾再多，也依然能拥有平时一样流畅的画面。



音乐：9/10

虽然没有令人印象深刻的主旋律，但仍存在很多记忆点。游戏中的音乐气势磅礴，能够烘托起激烈的战斗。



系统：8.5/10

同传统塔防游戏一样，波次间的间隔将进行暂停，允许玩家在此时建造防御塔。玩家可以随意移动防御塔，并且可以以原价出售，这就意味着玩家在暂停时间当中完全可以把建筑格局根据本波敌人的具体状况重新安排多次。除此以外，战斗过程当中仍允许玩家建造防御塔，且所有防御塔理论上都可被摧毁，为玩家提供了更多思考的空间。

但是，本作的地面防御塔仅能升级一次，让人感觉缺乏了终极武器与升级炮台的快感，并且玩家如果在关卡当中失败，虽然可以观看一些建筑的提示片段来深化自己的策略，但是除此之外就没有任何补偿，让人感觉缺乏持续挑战高难度的动力。



游戏性：9/10

剧情模式正常单局游戏时长约为20分钟-1小时左右，通关剧情模式约需要10-15小时，游戏时长基本可以接受。实际游戏过程中虽然有些累，但也总有继续打下一关的动力。塔防要素大于射击要素，即使是简单模式，胡乱放炮台也会很快被敌军淹没，不知所措。排行榜给了玩家一个刷分的理由，而创意工坊或许也在未来能够提升本作的游戏性。当然，如果不只是本地，而有联网合作模式就更好了。



总评：8.9/10

塔防和射击元素结合的比较成功，汉化不错，现在创意工坊空无一物，感兴趣者可以先行观望。

I had a blast playing this. Wishlisted the moment it was announced and waited patiently. 

TL/DR: Fun game, fair price. Tower defense + shmup. Excellent graphics and ambience. Decent voice acting. Hilariously sub par naming of bosses ( lol ) 

It is a tower defense game but less defense and more shmup imho. You can't defeat the levels with just towers alone, you must make use of the alien fighter and all of its abilities. Later game, I found myself favoring the laser and anti air, your experience may deviate/vary. 

I enjoyed almost every aspect of this game including the voice acting and the graphic design of the levels, enemies, terrain, bosses. Word of advice, always always always take the time to scoop up every resource you can, it really makes a difference if you slack off in resource gathering. As I said, you can not defeat the levels with towers alone (almost can later on when you're fully upgraded but not quite) but in that same regard, you can't just use the fighter and its abilities to defeat levels either, you're going to need those towers which means you're going to need all of those resources. 

Again, had a blast with this game, it was worth the wait and the fair price. Thanks devs.

34756445.review:
首先感谢开发者的key，这个游戏整体来说还是非常不错的。

先上评分： 8/10. 适合喜欢双摇杆射击以及各种爆炸效果的玩家。

1. 游戏性 ： 7/10

游戏讲述的是玩家是外星生物，要入侵地球，于是要在各个国家建基地并同化地球。在这个过程中要跟多个国家的军队进行对抗。

这些国家包括南非（不是太懂为什么南非是第一关，地形有点普通感觉）、加拿大、英国、美国、夏威夷、中国等等。每个国家是一关，一般一关会有6波攻击，总时长30分钟起，共十几关。

游戏玩法是还比较有创新的，结合塔防+双摇杆弹幕射击。玩家操控一架战斗机carry全场，可以满场跑建炮塔，也可以帮助各个线路解决漏网之鱼。下面具体说一下：

1.1 双摇杆射击

这部分可能我玩的类似的游戏不太多，我个人觉得还是不错的，有三种武器可以学习，且各有大招和护盾。三种武器分别是普通、对空导弹、对地导弹。双摇杆射击方面的玩法还是比较interesting的。

1.2 塔防

塔防方面的创新基本上我觉得只有一个改变线路，可是有些线路能改变的选择太少了。就我目前玩下来的关卡，也就加拿大那关可以把所有敌人都最后变到同一条线上，在那同一条线上集中火力收拾了。其他关卡基本上就只能在一些很明显能绕弯的地方让敌军绕个小弯或大弯。（可能我关卡玩的还比较少，就玩了4关）

另外就是每关的六波感觉稍显冗余，导致一关可能整个一小时其实玩法差别都不太大，个人觉得3-4关可能就够了。因为每波的兵种和路线基本上变化不大。

2. 画面 ： 8/10

作为一款新游以及塔防类游戏，画面算是不错的，我觉得建模建的十分好，对本作有不少加分。很多细节部分都做的很好，过场动画也丝毫不缩水。

另外游戏中的boss也做的很solid，无论是造型还是整体效果还是难度，会让人热血沸腾。

3. 音乐音效： 9/10

不得不说游戏的音效做的十分到位，BGM扣人心弦，旁白都有配音，而且毫无违和。爆炸的声效也是爽的飞起。

4. Bonus

本作还有个很大的加分点，就是双人合作模式，可以两人本地合作。作为多人本地游戏的老司机的我还是觉得这部作品依然会是一个很好的本地合作游戏的选择，无论是亲朋好友都可以一起玩耍，这游戏的存在价值就大大提高了。

5. 缺点

- 炮塔种类太少
- 线路改变方案偏少，可操作性一般
- 有点冗余，每关略长

6. 总结

整体来说，算的上瑕不掩瑜的一款佳作，跟基友一起轰轰轰也是不错的。

34728975.review:
Good arcade game with poor TD and strategy elements.

X -Morph Defense is the first nice looking game (if doesn't count Warstone) in the TD genre since KR Frontiers release. So, there were no question with buying it. I passed this game on Hard in about 12 hours. So, there are my thoughts.

If you waited for a good TD game, you waited in vain, because it's not a TD game. Do you want to place towers? Yeah, ok, but destroy a hundred of tanks  and avoid a thousand of projectiles before. Yeah, the game contains TD elements, but they are bare to bones. There are 7 towers. Yeah, you heard right. Could we add TD tag to the game if there are only 7 towers? I don't know, really...

There is everywhere on the store page is told "Tower Defense". So as a TD fan i was pretty disappointed, because first of all i waited for a TD game. ..... but i got an arcade game, a good one, with nice visuals and other cool stuff. I should admit, I don't like arcade games, but I liked this one.

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1127427079

[h1]About Gameplay.[/h1]
90% of the time you will move and shoot using X-Defender. You have 4 weapons for shooting, Plasma (weak and fast), Missile (Anti-air), Bombs (Splash ground) and Laser. Every weapon has charged ability: you can cast EMP strike or drop Dark Matter Bomb. 
So, you will use these things 90% of time until finished the game (12-14 hours). That's the thing i don't like in arcades, you should do the same things again and again. IT's getting bored soon.

But, devs did good job, arcade part of the game is on the top. Everything looks nice. Killing enemies are pleasant, especially at the first battles. Visual effects are nice. I highly like the shoot effects. My favorite is Dark Matter bomb

New types of units comes each new mission. You will force armored vehicles at the start, when tanks, artillery, bombers, heavy helicopters come. Each is weak for exact weapon or tower, so it makes the gameplay wider. 

You meet the first boss at the first map. Yeah, it was cool.

There are 14 missions. Five of them are side missions. I am sure, it's enough. To the end of the game, the game couldn't offer you new experience, so it's good when it finished so soon. In addition, i think 12-14 hours is enough to satisfy your wishes.

So what's about TD elements? As i said, there is 7 towers: basic, artillery, laser, flame and 3 anti air towers. Strategy part of the building is the simplest. If infantry comes - place flame tower, if tanks come place artillery towers, if heavy tanks come - place laser towers, if air forces come - place anti air. As I said, it's boring for TD fan.

What I liked. Each level is a maze level. You can increase the path by placing towers and !!! destroying environment. Yeah, it's cool idea. You place Dark matter Bomb and a collapsed scrapper blocks the path. This is the only one strategic part of the game. You should build the longest maze possible. There are no more strategic, everything else is pure arcade.

There are no armor types/damage. Enemies even don't have health bars (by default settings. you can turn them on. I didn't know that). So you can't undestand how many shoots/towers you need to deal with different enemies.

Enemies almost don't have special abilities. Yeah, there a re healers and jumpers. I wanted to see more special units with interesting features as Resurrection, invisibility, stun, damage decrease and other stuff...

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1127427011

[h1]Resume[/h1]
Pros
- Saturated arcade gameplay
- Stunning visuals
- Nice sound effects, voice acting and atmosphere
- No bugs were found

Neutral
- Enemies paths is changing every wave. Devs supposed it adds more interest to the game, but in real life it's just getting bored to check waves every time and replace towers. We want to place and upgrade towers, we don't want to replace them.
- Each mission is really long. Sometimes I wanted to stop the game, because i was tired, but it was only 5/7 waves :D
- Co-op mode with no LAN support. I undestand, you made the game for Xbos and PS4 in priority, but how should we play co-op at 1 computer without extra contoller or mouse. Arg...It's like to give user a car and didn't give him petrol.
- Enemy forces of all countries looks the same. I understand, use different models is impossible, but I would like to see national colors at least. It's really strange, when tanks in China, USA and Russia looks the same.

Cons
- Poor TD mechanics
- Skill tree for Towers and Defender is poor too. There are ~7 passive skills which doesn't affect gameplay at all. You can't upgrade the damage of your base weapons. So, you damage output at the first mission is almost the same at 14th mission. I think, devs should add more diversity to this part of the game
- Story is boring. Plot is good, but everything else you got is just old soldier grumbling. It's funny to hear "We experienced heavy loses" or "We have lost this battle" during the first mission. But he says the same meaning in other words for all missions. And, humanity didn't do really interesting with aliens. There are no plot twists. Everything is linear.

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1127426924

[h1]Conclusion[/h1]
As I TD fun i wasn't satisfied with this game. So I can't recommend this game for a full price for strategy fans. I think, you should take it with 25-50% discount, because even with a lack of TD elements it provides an interesting mix of genres and new experience. 

I play rarely at the games of not strategy genre. So I don't have much experience with arcade games, so can't say anything for sure. But visual are awesome, the arcade part of the game is cool, I liked playing it. So if you like games of this type - you should get it.

34714993.review:
X-Morph: Defense review

Thrilling, dynamic hybrid of Tower Defense and Top-Down Aerial Shooter, featuring spectacular, screen-filling explosions and special FX, ear-shattering sound FX and varied technology and upgrade ability trees.
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1127183037
You can certainly see some Starcraft DNA in the graphics, the abilities of your Terran-ish alien forces and the 'harvesting creep' but down by your units. But X-Morph brings its own personality too.

I've never been much of a Tower Defense game fan, and I think injecting a top-down shooter into it really freshens up the genre. While you can certainly focus more on one or the other, I find it works best and is most fun to use my ship to 'extinguish' hot spots on the map where the towers might need a little help to deal with enemy (Earth) forces.

You get to place your towers, use energy fence connections to align paths so the enemy has the longest route, etc. before starting a mission's combat. Then as the battle progresses, you gradually earn more energy, allowing you to go into "Ghost" mode to place more towers during combat. Though I have some difficulty tackling that while the map is going crazy. :)

Even though enemy paths are marked own on the map before a mission, it's still exciting and you still need to place towers, block paths, and fight with your aircraft in the right places to succeed.
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1127239228
Technologies and upgrades improve your main base, add different attacks/passive buffs for your aerial fighter and add different passive buffs and attack types for your towers.

The first boss battle with the giant spider-mech (for lack of a better description) is spectacular but thankfully challenging in a fair way.

This has 3 difficulty levels, and at least the promise of some future player-created content via a level editor, though nothing new's available just yet.

34708582.review:
This is a frantic shooter, NOT a tower defense game.  In it's own right, this is a GOOD game, however the bulk of marketing is targetted towards the tower defense audience.  

The best comparison I can make is to play Orcs Must Die with the shooter loadouts instead of putting points in traps.  In that scenario, you're always kinda' on the back-foot in a frantic shooter play style.  X-Morph's tower defense component is entirely secondary and the game's format plays in the afore mentioned OMD-shooter-loadout style.

I cannot recommend this game as a tower defense title.  It is clearly a shooter with some very lose tower defense elements.  It is polished, but extremely frustrating waiting for the tower defense payoff which doesn't happen.

Unrelated to game mechanics, the story is frustrating to endure.  Long winded, and largely redundant.  I can't handle listening to Uther (Warcraft) carry on about his half baked military revelations long after the player already understands...and aliens who contract their words while at the same time trying to portray a strict fully expressed dialogue is grinding to the ears.  Nobody of any mature gaming or literary experience managed to play an editorial role in the dialogue, story, or voice acting.  These felt like fan-fiction.

If you're a shooter guy...buy it.  Plenty of frantic controlling and hot-keying to do.  If not...then this could be hit or miss for you.

34705917.review:
I've been keeping track of this game since a post I saw on Imgur back in June of 2017. I was pretty excited to hear that it was finally releaed, but a bit skeptical (I hoped that it wasn't all just hype). For under $20 though I thought it was worth the risk. After having spent several hours in the game and messing around, I can definitely say I really enjoy the game. 

Some features I really like: 
- To keep the game from getting repetetive, each map has a slightly different play style and focus with a variety of enemies that don't show up on every map. 
- Game has multiple difficulties (I've only done normal so far), but found that to be adequately difficult. I am not sure I could succeed on higher difficulties without really careful planning.
- A good balance of number of enemies vs. health of each unit.
- The amazing physics and graphics (Never had low framerate despite all the particles on the screen).
- The overall complete feeling of the game. It feels like an entire game, and I've seen less charged for more. I've only encountered one minor bug where I couldn't access a single tower, but besides that, the game runs smoothly.
- The ability to place, remove, move, upgrade, and downgrade towers without punishment. Every wave you can destroy all of your towers and set them back up in any way you want. Placing a tower costs 1 resource point, and removing it returns 1 point. Upgrading and downgrading is the same way, and moving is free. Great system for all of us perfectionists.

The story is pretty much just an excuse to blow stuff up. It has a Pacific Rim sort of vibe of "We shall build giant death robots and to hell with city infastructure!" Can be cheesy at times, but at its core, it's a tower defence, not Mass Effect, and I rather enjoy it; It suits the game. 

Tl:Dr - Great game worth every dollar if you enjoy real-time, destructible environments that you can destroy in any way you see fit, strategic tower defense games, supporting well-made indie games, or any combination of those three.

34683639.review:
[h1]Трепещите, жалкие людишки!!![/h1]

Да-да...в этой игре мы не спасаем мир...Наша задача прямо противоположная - поработить Землю!

[h1]Графика и физика:[/h1]

Графика неплохая, но не более...конечно требовать от тауэр дефенса чего-то крутого не стоит...а вот физика действительно радует. Смачно заваливающиеся здания, взрывающиеся объекты, некий "реализм" разлета ошметков. Притом игра не стесняясь намекает, что физика одна из фишек, которую можно и нужно использовать в бою.

[h1]Звук:[/h1]

Бодренький звук. Каждую долю секунды что-то взрывается, стреляет и вопит....музычка всю эту какофонию звуков пытается собрать в единую картину...впрочем в некоторые моменты не слишком примечательные темы ОСТа меркнут на фоне происходящего звукового безобразия.

[h1]Геймплей:[/h1]

Отличная смесь тауэр дефенса с твин-стик шутером.

Под наше управление отдан истребитель-разведчик, чья задача помочь инопланетному разуму ассимилировать Землю. Конечно же посудинка снаряжена различными примочками: здесь Вам и плазмаметы, ЕМП импульсы, лазеры...есть даже возможность создать мощнейшую сингулярность прям по среди поля.

Помимо самого кораблика есть и турельки...их к сожалению не так много видов: тут Вам огнеметные башенки, АА-туретки, артиллерия, лазер и стандартная башня...все.

И вот мы оказались на карте...есть ядро, которое нужно защищать...есть пути подхода врагов. Строим башни, участвуем в баталии сами...И если поначалу личное присутствие не всегда потребуется, то с каждым последующим уровнем накал начнет расти....Вы будете носиться от края до края карты, отбиваясь от роя вертолетов и самолетов, маневрируя между выстрелами наземной техники, пытаясь попутно собрать ошметки врагов на переработку, грейдя свои туретки и следя за целостностью созданных рубежей. Такой творящийся хаос не каждому придется по душе. Игра беспощадно дает понять, что требует быстрого мышления и хорошей реакции. 

Отдельно скажу о боссах...здесь это огромные консервные банки...выглядят внушительно, уничтожаются задорно. Бои хоть и просты сами по себе, когда понимаешь систему атаки болванчиков...но зрелищны.

[h1]Итог:[/h1]

Хорошая игровая смесь жанров, не дающая заскучать и затягивающая своей простотой и очарованием. Хотите эшена? Хотите bullet hell'a? Хотите в кои-то веки побыть инопланетным захватчиком? Тогда смело берите!
Моя оценка - 8 из 10. Минус игра получает за не слишком выразительный ОСТ и отсутствие онлайн коопа...уж простите, локальный кооп меня не прельщает (впрочем есть надежда, что добавят онлайн).

因为我实在不知道录什么游戏了，所以抱着凑数的态度去玩这款游戏
玩下来结果让我震惊了，这游戏不能说多牛逼，但是还是一个值得玩的游戏

首先他是一个射击+塔防结合的很好的游戏，你在幽灵模式下能做很多事情
躲避子弹，建造炮塔，收集碎片。你在正常模式下还能切换4套武器组合
就光他的切断敌人路线，让敌人在我的安排下绕路走我就觉得很满意

地图的场景会不断扩大，敌人会从几个地方转变成四面八方涌进来
合理的部署才是取胜的关键，顾此失彼的事情可以用移动炮台来解决，非常人性化

可惜的是，合作只能本地，不能联网。只能约基友一起嗨了
UI的粗糙感也扣分不少，敌人的部队希望每一波都有一些新东西
